abstract.text: A view controller that displays the current maneuver instruction as a “banner” flush with the edges of the
containing view. The user swipes to one side to preview a subsequent maneuver.

inlineContent.text: This class is the default top banner view controller used by

abstract.text: This protocol defines a UI Component that is capable of presenting a status message.
A view that displays the current maneuver instruction as a “card” resembling a user notification.
A subsequent maneuver is always partially visible on one side of the view.
A view that contains a simple image indicating a type of maneuver.
A view that contains one or more images indicating which lanes of road the user should take to complete the
maneuver.
GenericRouteShield` is a class to render routes that do not have route-shields.
A view that indicates the layout of a highway junction.
A junction view shows an image depicting the layout of a highway junction.
A view controller that displays the current maneuver instruction as a “banner” flush with the edges of the
containing view. The user swipes to one side to preview a subsequent maneuver.
The delegate for the view controller.
Protocols that provide no-op default method implementations can use this protocol to log a message to the console
whenever an unimplemented delegate method is called.
